name: Ablaze
description:
Hello world! This is a game my friend and I threw together in a week for the Brackeys 2023 GameJam (An end is a new beginning). Play as a flame that makes it's way through randomly generated dungeons. This is our first ever GameJam and we'd much appreciate you give it a look. 

The game has no win condition, simply explore the dungeons to your heart's content.
